snippet: Better ratings at the children’s network raised revenue, as did streaming services like Amazon and Hulu.
abstract: Nickelodeon's resurgence and new online streaming deal with Amazon contributes to 20 percent increase in profits at Viacom in latest financial quarter; Viacom reports net income of $643 million, or $1.31 a share, up from $534 million, or $1.01 a share year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Better ratings at the children’s network raised revenue, as did streaming services like Amazon and Hulu.

headline.main: Nickelodeon on the Mend, Profit Soars at Viacom
headline.print_headline: Nickelodeon On the Mend, Profit Soars At Viacom
